entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Brampton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -12.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 10:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -12.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -16.9°C
Wind: SW 39 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
